TITLE: Trim your videos online
META: Easiest way to Trim your videos online.
LABEL: DOCX to PDF

TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: Our website is platform independent. It works on both Window and iOS Operating systems and can be used without any downloads required.
The conversion is absolutely free, so you can convert as many files as you want.
Our website prioritises its customersâ€™ privacy. Since we work with cloud storage your files do not get uploaded. So, no chance of getting any data breach. Your data is safe with us!
The conversion process hardly takes a few seconds, depending on your file size, and you can get quick results easily.
Video editing is really fast and you can get your job done in no time
Our website is platform independent, can work on laptops, tabs and phones and the conversion is quick, it saves time.

HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to trim your video
steps: Choose your video file or Click on the drop down arrow and select Dropbox/Google Drive
Wait patiently till the video gets loaded
Set the frames or timeline that is to be trimmed from the video
Click save to download your video

FAQ.question: Will the quality of my video decrease after trimming it?
FAQ.answer: Untill and unless you change the resolution of your file, it won't affect the quality of your Video file. The quality of your video will remain intact, only the size or the length will be changed.

FAQ.question: Can I split my video in Video trimmer?
FAQ.answer: Yes, you can both trim and split your videos. You can drag over the playback bar to see the timer, at which you want to stop, or click on the play back bar at the spot and click on save. Your video will be saved and ready to download.

FAQ.question: Can I upload and trim any other file type?
FAQ.answer: With Video Trimmer, you can upload and trim any type of video file that you want. It supports MP4, MOV, FLV, AVI, MKV and other video files type.

FAQ.question: Why is it taking so long to process my file?
FAQ.answer: The time taken to trim and process your video depend on the size, aspect ratio and the number of trims you have performed. If your file size is bigger, it will take a bit longer than regular files.

FAQ.question: Which Windows versions does Video Trimmer support?
FAQ.answer: Video Trimmer is completely web-based and therefore provides cross-platform support. This means that our tool supports all versions of Windows. It not only works on windows operating system, but can work on any other operating system, that supports a browser.

FAQ.question: Does it support both Android and iOS platforms?
FAQ.answer: Yes, our website works on browser, and therefore supports both iOS and Android platforms
All processing is done on your browser, and no files are transferred to the server. Hence your files are 100% safe.
FAQ.question: Will my uploaded files be saved on the server?
Will I have to create an account to use Video Trimmer?
FAQ.answer: Our website does not require you to sign up or create an account. The platform is absolutely free and you can compress as many files as you want.

FAQ.question: Will I be charged to use the website?
FAQ.answer: Our website is absolutely free and you can use it as many times as you want. There are no free trial uses, after which you will have to pay for using our services. We won't charge you anything.

FAQ.question: What is the difference between trim and split?
FAQ.answer:
Trimming allows you to cut your video from either end of the entire length of the video. You can shorten your video as much as you like from either the starting or the ending or both as well.
Splitting a video means dividing your video into two or more parts. After splitting your video you can make individual changes to video parts and save the video as one file.

FAQ.question: How can I trim multiple videos?
FAQ.answer: Video Trimmer allows you to trim multiple files, one after the other. When you trim one file and click on save, the video will be processed. After the video has been processes, you can see download option on the screen. By clicking on it you can download the trimmed file. In order to trim another video, you only need to refresh the browser and you will see upload video option. Now you can again select your file which you want to trim.

FAQ.question: I refreshed the browser by mistake. What do I do?
FAQ.answer: Since our website does not use any servers and does not store your data, the file that you have uploaded, will not be saved. You need to reupload the file to trim it.
